text: Futhi ngempela phakathi kwabantu bencwadi kukhona labo abakholwa kuMvelinqangi nakulokho okwembulwa kunina nakulokho okwembulwa kubona, bezithoba ngokuzinikela kuMvelinqangi abawathengi amavesi kaMvelinqangi ngenani elincane labo-ke okwabo umvuzo wabo useNkosini yabo ngempela uMvelinqangi ungosheshayo ekubaleni (ekwahluleleni)
